alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 1:52PM CST until February 16 at 2:15PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CST FOR CENTRAL TIPPAH AND WESTERN ALCORN COUNTIES... At 151 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ripley, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Ripley, Blue Mountain, Gravestown, Hinkle, Theo, Falkner, Kossuth, Chalybeate, Murry, Allentown, Hightown, Collinstown, Wenasoga, Biggersville, Crumtown, Gift, Lone Pine, Whitten Town and Peoples. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for northeastern Mississippi...and west Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
